1.content: Again, no real impact, but we gotta ask.
1.title: First choice.

info.brief_description: A story about people with abilities and skills quite unlike our own
info.description:
You are the main character, a completly normal person who lives a completly normal life. everything is ordinary, and rather dull.
but then, for the sake of plot, a horrible tragedy occurs, resulting in the death and destruction of the nearby people, who you might hold dear.

Your character, your story. this is your world, and I demand that you live it.

male or female has no actual impact in the story other then how some people treat you. cause people are bastards.

Enjoy, feel free to add.
